features.description: Initialize Next.js (or chosen framework) project with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and basic app structure
verification: npm run dev starts without errors
Homepage renders a placeholder dashboard layout

features.description: User can view and inline-edit the project name at the top of the dashboard
verification: Clicking the name makes it editable

features.description: User can view, add, edit, and remove key links with labels and URLs
verification: Links display as a list with labels
User can add a new link with label and URL

features.description: User can view and inline-edit role-based contacts (Program, Product, Engineering, etc.)
User can set health indicator (Red/Yellow/Green) and project phase (Discovery/Planning/Execution)
verification: Health indicator displays with color coding
User can manually toggle health status

features.description: User can view and edit the target delivery/GA date
User can write weekly executive summaries with template sections (Progress, Next Steps, Risks) and view history
verification: Rich text editor for summary entry
User can create a new weekly entry

features.description: User can view and inline-edit scope text for a given time period
verification: Scope text area displays with period label
User can inline-edit the scope text

features.description: User can view, add, edit milestones in a table with name, status, start/finish dates
verification: Milestones display in a table format
User can add a new milestone row
User can inline-edit name, status, dates
Status options: Complete, In Progress, Not Started

features.description: User can manage RAID items (Risks, Actions, Issues, Dependencies) with collapsible view and side panel
verification: RAID items display in a filterable/sortable table
Side panel opens for detailed editing
Columns: Summary, Severity, Type, Status, Assigned To, Next Steps

features.description: User can access an expandable project plan (Google Sheets-like) from the dashboard
verification: Project plan is NOT shown on main dashboard by default

features.description: User can share the dashboard with others at different access levels (Owner, Editor, Viewer, Commenter)
User can subscribe to notifications (health status changes) via Outlook/Slack with frequency options
All dashboard data persists via API/backend with auto-save
verification: API endpoints exist for all CRUD operations
